EnhancedContent:
Delegated bypass controls allow you to choose who can bypass push protection for secret scanning and designate reviewers for bypass requests. You can now manage your list of approvers and review bypass requests for push protection at the enterprise level, giving you the ability to triage all bypass requests across all organizations in one place.

You can set reviewers through an Enterprise Security Configuration, and you can view the requests under the **Security** tab. You can also set reviewers and manage requests through the API.

Check out our docs to learn more about [secret scanning](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest/code-security/secret-scanning) and [push protection](https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/code-security/secret-scanning/introduction/about-push-protection).

Author: Allison
Title: Delegated bypass controls for push protection now available at the enterprise level
